title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label height does not change immediately.
OB: The label height remains unchanged after modifying the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height is expected to adjust automatically when the font size is modified.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a label to the UI. 2. Edit the font size of the label to be '18 points'.
